about_the_game:
Set of 12 SD version character sleeves from "Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days".

[INCLUDED]
- Yuki Ichidoji
- Gosetsu Katsushika
- Tatsuki Bunkyo
- Masaru Kita
- Doshi Nakano
- Kana Aoyama
- Yui Itabashi
- Yu-yu Kondo
- Tohya Ebata
- Megumi Okura
- Zakusa Ishigame
- Tomari Seto

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
